result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Damani L Degree

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Damani L Degree appeared by video.  Attorney Corey R. Flynn appeared by video for Damani L Degree.  Prosecuting attorney Olivia Simmons appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. 
Hearing held via Zoom.  Pretrial conference held.  Atty. Flynn has not received discovery and an offer and needs to discuss with the defendant. Defense would like a status date.  Case adjourned to Br. 1. This hearing will be heard via Zoom.
Status conference scheduled for November 17, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms. 
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT TO REPORT TO THE MILWAUKEE COUNTY JAIL (CJF) TO BE BOOKED AND RELEASED BY 5:00 P.M. ON 09-28-2022. IF THEY FAIL TO APPEAR, A BENCH WARRANT WILL BE ISSUED FOR THEIR ARREST.

Defendant Damani L Degree in court.  Prosecuting attorney Foley J. Van Lieshout Ms. in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defendant advised that this case is assigned to Judge Davila, Branch 1.
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause. Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 right to challenge probable cause and to have complaint read until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance. Defendant IS Public Defender eligible. Defendant is ordered to provide the public defender's office with the next court date.  
The case is adjourned to Br. 1 for a Pretrial Conference.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 19, 2022 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Damani L Degree
Current: 6208 W Port Ave., Milwaukee, WI 53223 United States  (Effective: 09-09-2022)
Prior: 5329 North Teutonia Avenue,103, Milwaukee, WI 53209
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 9/26/22 @ 1:30p
